ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
pip-system-certs patches pip and requests at runtime to use certificates
from the default system store (rather than the bundled certs ca).

This will allow pip to verify tls/ssl connections to servers whose cert is
trusted by your system install.
about.summary: Live patches pip and requests to use system certs by default

about.description:
pip-system-certs patches pip and requests at runtime to use certificates
from the default system store (rather than the bundled certs ca).

This will allow pip to verify tls/ssl connections to servers whose cert is
trusted by your system install.
about.summary: Live patches pip and requests to use system certs by default

name: pip-system-certs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pip-system-certs" %}
{% set version = "5.3" %}
{% set python_min = "3.10" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/pip_system_certs-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 19c8bf9957bcce7d69c4dbc2d0b2ef13de1984d53f50a59012e6dbbad0af67c6
  patches:
    - static-version.patch

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 1

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - wheel
    - setuptools >=61
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - pip >=24.2
    - truststore >=0.10.0

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://gitlab.com/alelec/pip-system-certs
  summary: Live patches pip and requests to use system certs by default
  description: |
    pip-system-certs patches pip and requests at runtime to use certificates
    from the default system store (rather than the bundled certs ca).

    This will allow pip to verify tls/ssl connections to servers whose cert is
    trusted by your system install.
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  dev_url: https://gitlab.com/alelec/pip-system-certs

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - adament
